title: Understanding the Freeze Feature
text: The freeze feature is useful when you want to keep specific rows or columns visible while scrolling through the rest of the spreadsheet.

title: Purpose of Freezing
text: Freezing rows or columns helps maintain visibility of important data as you navigate through the spreadsheet.

title: Scrolling and Visibility
text: When scrolling through a large spreadsheet, freezing allows certain rows or columns to remain in view.

title: Common Use Cases
text: Freezing is often used to keep headers or key data points visible while examining other parts of the spreadsheet.

title: Practical Application
text: Consider freezing the top row to keep column headers visible as you scroll down the spreadsheet.
